org.loklak.susi

Class SusiArgument

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.loklak.susi.SusiArgument

  • public class SusiArgument
extends java.lang.Object
    An Argument is a series of thoughts, also known as a 'proof' in automated reasoning. Within the Susi AI infrastructure this may be considered as the representation of the short-time memory of thinking inside Susi.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • times

        public int times()
        Get an impression of time which elapsed since the start of reasoning in this argument
        Returns:
        the number of thoughts

      • mindstate

        public SusiThought mindstate()
        The mindstate is the current state of an argument
        Returns:
        the latest thought in a series of proof steps

      • remember

        public SusiThought remember(int timesBack)
        Remembering the thoughts is essential to recall which thoughts leads to the current mindstate
        Parameters:
        timesBack - the number of thoughts backwards from the current mindstate
        Returns:
        the thought in the past according to the elapsed time of the thoughts

      • think

        public SusiArgument think(SusiThought thought)
        Thinking is a series of thoughts, every new thought appends another thought to the argument. A special situation may (or may not) occur if one thinking step does not produce a result. Depending on the inference rule set that may mean that the consideration of the rule containing the inferences was wrong and should be abandoned. This happens if mindstate().equals(thought).
        Parameters:
        thought - the next thought
        Returns:
        self, the current mindstate

      • unify

        public java.lang.String unify(java.lang.String statement)
        Unification applies a piece of memory wihtin the current argument to a statement which creates an instantiated statement
        Parameters:
        statement -
        Returns:
        the instantiated statement with elements of the argument applied
